### 

I am integrative biologist working at the intersection of chronobiology, animal behavior, infectious diseases, and aging. I am currently working with [Prof. Deborah Gordon](http://web.stanford.edu/~dmgordon/index.html) as a postdoctoral researcher. For my dissertation, I worked with [Dr. Charissa de Bekker](http://sciences.ucf.edu/biology/debekkerlab/), exploring the role of biological clocks in behavioral plasticity and parasitic manipulation of host behavior using the "zombie ant" system.
